description: The modern link-in-bio solution for creators and businesses.
resetMessage: If your account exists, you will receive an email to reset your password.
title: Title
linkRequired: At least one link is required.
profileReady: Your profile is ready. You can always edit it in the dashboard.
heroDescription: LikeUlike is your digital business card for all your channels. Share one link and keep your community up to date!
communityTitle:
KEEP YOUR COMMUNITY
UP TO DATE
WITH LIKEULIKE
communityText1: On Instagram, TikTok or Twitter – many platforms limit you to just one link in your bio.
communityText2: LikeUlike is your central landing page where you can find all your clickable links in one place. This increases traffic to all your channels so your followers never miss your content.
brandsText: These brands already use LikeUlike, together with over 25,000 influencers, artists and entrepreneurs. Join the community.
privacyText1: LikeUlike is a GDPR-compliant alternative to Linktree & Co.
privacyText2: We do not use user tracking or tracking cookies and rely exclusively on servers in Germany. This makes LikeUlike a 100% GDPR-compliant alternative to all link-in-bio providers that force you to pay with your data. You can use LikeUlike for advertising purposes in your bio on Instagram and TikTok with a clear conscience.
businessTitle:
DO YOU USE INSTAGRAM
FOR YOUR BUSINESS?
businessText1: Every commercial social media profile must comply with legal requirements.
businessText2: If you use social media for your business, you are required to provide an imprint, terms and conditions, privacy policy or terms of use. You can add all legal documents to your LikeUlike with just one click. Our service gives you free access to a privacy policy worth €7 per month.
ctaTitle:
CREATE YOUR OWN LIKEULIKE
IN JUST A FEW MINUTES
ctaStep1:
Choose your LikeUlike name
and get started.
ctaStep2: Add as many links as you want. Fast and easy.
ctaStep3:
Choose a color, upload your
profile picture and you're done.
footerClaim: The GDPR-compliant link-in-bio solution for creators and businesses.
enterUsername: Enter a username to see your biolink preview
